name: Scaredy Mage
description:
You're a scared mage trapped in a forest clearing with skeletons closing in. Your mana drains with each fireball you shoot. There also seems to be a ghost following you... it doesn't hurt when it gets close. Despite you knowing it is not real it still dashes your focus; making it harder to cast your magic.

I apologize about the subpar quality of my game. I am very new to developing games and had a busy week with school. However, I am trying to learn, and I thought completing a game for a game jam would be a good way to start. If you take the time to play then thank you!
